statements: DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND equipment_name = 'Printer';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND maintenance_type = 'Scheduled Maintenance';
DELETE FROM Equipment WHERE equipment_id IN (SELECT equipment_id FROM MaintenanceHistory WHERE maintenance_date < DATE '2022-01-01');
DELETE FROM maintenance_history WHERE technician_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE model = 'X300' AND purchase_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE robot_id = 3 AND last_maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
